events.name: Midnight Book Launch
events.description: Join us for a magical midnight celebration as we unveil the most anticipated fantasy series of the year. Experience live readings, costume contests, and magical refreshments!

events.name: Author's Spellbound Session
events.description: Meet bestselling fantasy author Elena Nightshade for an intimate discussion about worldbuilding, character creation, and the art of weaving magical narratives.

events.name: Books & Brews Festival
events.description: A magical afternoon of storytelling, featuring local authors, themed beverages, and interactive story workshops. Bring your favorite book to trade!

events.name: Young Wizards Book Club
events.description: Special monthly meetup for young readers (ages 8-12) featuring magical crafts, storytelling sessions, and character costume parade!
